class.name: CATPrtManageFeatBuildExt
class.abstract: Class to implement the interface CATIPrtManageFeatBuild.

method.name: BuildNecessity
method.abstract: Returns the boolean flag indicating if the build is necessary.

method.name: GetBody
method.abstract: Returns the stored body.

method.name: GetCurrentJournal
method.abstract: Returns the stored topological journal.

method.name: GetLocalSketchTransfo
method.abstract: Returns the stored local transformation.

method.name: GetOperand
method.abstract: Returns the list of stored operands.

method.name: ReportIsNecessary
method.abstract: Specifies that it is necessary to store the report journal.

method.name: ReportIsNotNecessary
method.abstract: Specifies that it is not necessary to store the report journal.

method.name: ReportNecessity
method.abstract: Returns the boolean flag indicating if the report storage is necessary.

method.name: SetBody
method.abstract: Sets the computed body.

method.name: SetCurrentJournal
method.abstract: Sets the topological journal.

method.name: SetLocalSketchTransfo
method.abstract: Sets the local transformation of the sketch.

method.name: SetOperand
method.abstract: Sets the list of operands used by the patterned feature to create the report.

data.name: _ListKeys
data.abstract: List of keys associated with each specifications.

data.name: _ListSpec
data.abstract: List of specifications to create the report.

data.name: _LocalTransfo
data.abstract: Local transformation to be applied to the sketch to compute the geometry.

enum.name: CATPrtChamferExtremities
enum.abstract: Values to manage the extremities of the chamfer.

enum.name: CATPrtChamferMode
enum.abstract: The chamfer parameter mode specifies both parameters required to define the chamfer.

enum.name: CATPrtChamferPropagation
enum.abstract: The propagation mode specifies the edges taken into account when chamfering.

enum.name: CATPrtChamferReferenceFace
enum.abstract: Chamfer face used as reference to measure chamfer first or single length.

enum.name: CATPrtFilletPropagation
enum.abstract: The propagation mode specifies the edges taken into account when filleting.

enum.name: CATPrtFilletType
enum.abstract: The fillet type specifies the ways the fillet is defined.

enum.name: CATPrtOffsetSens
enum.abstract: Offset direction of the offset feature.

enum.name: CATPrtSplitType
enum.abstract: Side to be kept for splitting or sewing operation.

enum.name: CATPrtTrimSupportMode
enum.abstract: The trim support check button enables to obtain the surface ribbons sewed on the initial skin or not.

function.name: CATCreateCATIPrtThreadStandardServices
function.abstract: Creates a service component that implements CATIPrtThreadStandardServices.

function.name: CATCreateCATIPrtUIFactory
function.abstract: Creates a service component that implement CATIPrtUIFactory.

class.name: CATIChamfer
class.abstract: Interface to represent the chamfer shape.

method.name: AddObject
method.abstract: Adds elements to be chamfered.

method.name: GetContext
method.abstract: Returns the context of the chamfer (0 for PartDesign, 1 for Surfaces, 4 for Volumes and 5 for Functional).

method.name: GetCornerCapMode
method.abstract: Returns the CornerCapMode of the chamfer.

method.name: GetExtremities
method.abstract: Returns the Extremities of the chamfer.

method.name: GetLength1
method.abstract: Returns the first value of the chamfer.

method.name: GetLength2
method.abstract: Returns the second length value or the angle value of the chamfer.

method.name: GetMode
method.abstract: Returns the chamfer parameter mode.

method.name: GetObject
method.abstract: Returns the list of chamfered edges or faces.

method.name: GetPropagation
method.abstract: Returns the propagation mode of the elements to be chamfered.

method.name: GetReferenceFace
method.abstract: Returns the chamfer orientation.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Returns the Support of the chamfer.

method.name: GetSymmetricalExtent
method.abstract: Returns the SymmetricalExtent button status.

method.name: GetTrimSupportMode
method.abstract: Returns the TrimSupportMode of the chamfer.

method.name: ModifyCornerCapMode
method.abstract: Sets the CornerCapMode of the chamfer.

method.name: ModifyExtremities
method.abstract: Sets the Extremities of the chamfer.

method.name: ModifyLength1
method.abstract: Sets the first value of the chamfer.

method.name: ModifyLength2
method.abstract: Sets the second length value or the angle value of the chamfer.

method.name: ModifyMode
method.abstract: Sets the chamfer parameter mode.

method.name: ModifyPropagation
method.abstract: Sets the propagation mode of the elements to be chamfered.

method.name: ModifyReferenceFace
method.abstract: Sets the chamfer orientation.

method.name: ModifySupport
method.abstract: Sets the Support of the chamfer.

method.name: ModifySymmetricalExtent
method.abstract: Set the SymmetricalExtent button status.

method.name: ModifyTrimSupportMode
method.abstract: Sets the TrimSupportMode of the chamfer.

method.name: RemoveObject
method.abstract: Removes elements from those to be chamfered.

method.name: SetContext
method.abstract: Sets the context of the chamfer (0 for PartDesign, 1 for Surfaces, 4 for Volumes and 5 for Functional).

class.name: CATICircPatt
class.abstract: Interface to read or modify the specifications of the circular pattern.

method.name: GetDir
method.abstract: Returns the axis around which duplications will be rotated relative to each other.

method.name: GetInstRot
method.abstract: Returns the boolean flag that specifies if duplications keep the same orientation.

method.name: GetNa
method.abstract: Returns the position of the original feature among its duplications along the axial direction.

method.name: GetNba
method.abstract: Returns the number of times that the original feature will be duplicated along the pattern axial direction.

method.name: GetNbr
method.abstract: Returns the number of times that the original feature will be duplicated along the pattern radial direction.

method.name: GetNr
method.abstract: Returns the position of the original feature among its duplications along the radial direction.

method.name: GetParmSS
method.abstract: Returns the Stagger Step parameter.

method.name: GetPto
method.abstract: Returns the point that specifies the pattern rotation center.

method.name: GetSensa
method.abstract: Returns the boolean flag indicating the natural orientation of the axial direction used to orientate the pattern operation.

method.name: GetStagerStep
method.abstract: Returns the value of the Stagger Step.

method.name: GetStaggerPattChoice
method.abstract: Returns if user wants to have stagger pattern configuration.

method.name: GetStaggerPattType
method.abstract: Returns the orientation of Stagger Pattern.

method.name: GetStepa
method.abstract: Returns the distance that separate two consecutive duplications in the pattern along its axial direction.

method.name: GetStepr
method.abstract: Returns the distance that separate two consecutive duplications in the pattern along its radial direction.

method.name: ModifyDir
method.abstract: Sets the axis around which duplications will be rotated relative to each other.

method.name: ModifyInstRot
method.abstract: Sets the boolean flag that specifies if duplications keep the same orientation.

method.name: ModifyPto
method.abstract: Sets the pattern rotation center.

method.name: ModifySensa
method.abstract: Sets the boolean flag indicating the natural orientation of the axial direction used to orientate the pattern operation.

method.name: ModifyStaggerPattChoice
method.abstract: Modifies the choice of creation of stagger pattern configuration.

method.name: ModifyStaggerPattType
method.abstract: Modifies the orientation of Stagger Pattern.

class.name: CATIClose
class.abstract: Interface to represent close feature.

method.name: GetCloseElement
method.abstract: Retrieves the surfacic feature to be closed.

method.name: SwapCloseElement
method.abstract: Sets or swaps the surfacic feature to be closed.

class.name: CATICounterBoredHole
class.abstract: Class to manage CounterBored hole feature.

method.name: GetCBDepth
method.abstract: Returns value of CounterBored depth.

method.name: GetCBDepth
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to CounterBored depth.

method.name: GetCBDiameter
method.abstract: Returns value of CounterBored diameter.

method.name: GetCBDiameter
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to CounterBored diameter.

method.name: SetCBDepth
method.abstract: Sets value of CounterBored depth.

method.name: SetCBDiameter
method.abstract: Sets value of CounterBored diameter.

class.name: CATICounterDrilledHole
class.abstract: Class to manage CounterDrilled hole feature.

method.name: GetCDAngle
method.abstract: Returns value of CounterDrilled angle.

method.name: GetCDAngle
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to CounterDrilled angle.

method.name: GetCDDepth
method.abstract: Returns value of CounterDrilled depth.

method.name: GetCDDepth
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to the CounterDrilled depth.

method.name: GetCDDiameter
method.abstract: Returns CounterDrilled hole diameter.

method.name: GetCDDiameter
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to CounterDrilled diameter.

method.name: SetCDAngle
method.abstract: Sets value of CounterDrilled angle.

method.name: SetCDDepth
method.abstract: Sets value of CounterDrilled depth.

method.name: SetCDDiameter
method.abstract: Sets value of CounterDrilled diameter.

class.name: CATICounterSunkHole
class.abstract: Class to manage CounterSunk hole feature.

method.name: GetCSAngle
method.abstract: Returns value of CounterSunk angle.

method.name: GetCSAngle
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to CounterSunk angle.

method.name: GetCSDepth
method.abstract: Returns value of CounterSunk depth.

method.name: GetCSDepth
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to CounterSunk depth.

method.name: SetCSAngle
method.abstract: Sets value of CounterSunk angle.

method.name: SetCSDepth
method.abstract: Sets value of CounterSunk depth.

class.name: CATIDraft
class.abstract: Interface to read or modify the draft feature.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Returns the draft angle value.

method.name: GetContext
method.abstract: Returns the context of Draft feature.

method.name: GetMode
method.abstract: Returns the draft mode (standard or reflectline).

method.name: GetNeutral
method.abstract: Returns the neutral element.

method.name: GetParting
method.abstract: Returns the parting element.

method.name: GetPullDirOrientation
method.abstract: Gets the pulling direction orientation.

method.name: GetPullingDirection
method.abstract: Returns the pulling direction as a normalized vector.

method.name: GetPullingDirectionObject
method.abstract: Returns the pulling direction reference.

method.name: GetSupportToDraft
method.abstract: Returns the list of faces to be drafted.

method.name: ModifyAngle
method.abstract: Sets the draft angle value.

method.name: ModifyNeutral
method.abstract: Sets the draft neutral element.

method.name: ModifyParting
method.abstract: Sets the draft parting element.

method.name: ModifyPullingDirection
method.abstract: Sets the pulling direction.

method.name: ModifyPullingDirection
method.abstract: Sets the pulling direction reference.

method.name: SetContext
method.abstract: Sets the context of Draft feature.

method.name: SetPullDirOrientation
method.abstract: Sets the pulling direction orientation.

class.name: CATIEdgeFillet
class.abstract: Interface to represent the edge fillet shape with a constant radius or a variable radius.

method.name: AddFilletRadius
method.abstract: Adds new radius/vertex pairs.

method.name: AddKeepEdge
method.abstract: Adds edges that must not be modified during the fillet operation.

method.name: AddObject
method.abstract: Adds elements to be filleted.

method.name: GetFilletType
method.abstract: Returns the fillet type.

method.name: GetObject
method.abstract: Returns the list of filleted edges or faces.

method.name: GetPropagation
method.abstract: Returns the propagation mode of the elements to be filleted.

method.name: GetRadius
method.abstract: Returns the edge fillet constant radius.

method.name: GetRadiusOnVertex
method.abstract: Returns the fillet radius on an imposed vertex of a variable edge fillet.

method.name: GetVariation
method.abstract: Returns the edge fillet radius variation mode.

method.name: GetVertex
method.abstract: Returns the list of defined vertices.

method.name: ModifyPropagation
method.abstract: Sets the propagation mode of the elements to be filleted.

method.name: ModifyRadius
method.abstract: Sets the edge fillet constant radius.

method.name: ModifyRadiusOnVertex
method.abstract: Sets the fillet radius on an imposed vertex of a variable edge fillet.

method.name: ModifyVariation
method.abstract: Sets the edge fillet radius variation mode.

method.name: RemoveFilletRadius
method.abstract: Removes a radius/vertex pair from those to be defined.

method.name: RemoveKeepEdge
method.abstract: Removes edges from those to be not modified.

method.name: RemoveObject
method.abstract: Removes elements from those to be filleted.

class.name: CATIFaceFillet
class.abstract: Interface to represent the face fillet shape.

method.name: GetFirstFace
method.abstract: Returns the first filleted face.

method.name: GetRadius
method.abstract: Returns the face fillet radius.

method.name: GetSecondFace
method.abstract: Returns the second filleted face.

method.name: ModifyRadius
method.abstract: Sets the face fillet radius.

method.name: SetFirstFace
method.abstract: Sets or removes the first face to be filleted.

method.name: SetSecondFace
method.abstract: Sets or removes the second face to be filleted.

class.name: CATIFillet
class.abstract: Interface to represent the fillet shape.

class.name: CATIGroove
class.abstract: Interface which characterizes the Groove feature.

class.name: CATIHoleLimit
class.abstract: Class to manage hole bottom limit.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Returns angle value of bottom limit.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to bottom limit angle.

method.name: SetAngle
method.abstract: Sets angle value of bottom limit.

class.name: CATIMirror
class.abstract: Interface to read or modify the mirror's specifications.

method.name: GetPlane
method.abstract: Returns the mirroring element as a plane or face that specifies the mirror.

method.name: ModifyMirrorPlane
method.abstract: Sets the face or plane about which the body is mirrored.

class.name: CATINewHole
class.abstract: Class to manage hole feature.

method.name: GetAnchorType
method.abstract: Returns hole anchor mode.

method.name: GetBottomType
method.abstract: Returns hole bottom type.

method.name: GetContext
method.abstract: Returns hole context.

method.name: GetDiameter
method.abstract: Returns hole diameter.

method.name: GetDiameter
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to hole diameter.

method.name: GetDirection
method.abstract: Returns hole direction.

method.name: GetHoleType
method.abstract: Returns hole type.

method.name: GetLimit
method.abstract: Returns hole bottom limit.

method.name: GetPosition
method.abstract: Returns hole origin point and hole direction.

method.name: GetThreadDepth
method.abstract: Returns hole thread Depth.

method.name: GetThreadDepth
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to hole thread depth.

method.name: GetThreadDiameter
method.abstract: Returns hole thread diameter.

method.name: GetThreadDiameter
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to hole thread diameter.

method.name: GetThreadPitch
method.abstract: Returns hole thread pitch.

method.name: GetThreadPitch
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to hole thread pitch.

method.name: GetThreadSide
method.abstract: Returns the value of the direction of the Thread Side.

method.name: GetThreadedBottomLimit
method.abstract: Retrieves the hole thread bottom limit.

method.name: GetThreadedBottomType
method.abstract: Retrieves the hole thread bottom type.

method.name: IsThreaded
method.abstract: Returns hole threading mode.

method.name: Reverse
method.abstract: Inverts hole direction.

method.name: SetAnchorType
method.abstract: Sets hole anchor mode.

method.name: SetBottomType
method.abstract: Sets hole bottom type.

method.name: SetContext
method.abstract: Set hole context.

method.name: SetDiameter
method.abstract: Sets hole diameter.

method.name: SetDirection
method.abstract: Sets hole direction.

method.name: SetHoleType
method.abstract: Sets hole type.

method.name: SetLimit
method.abstract: Sets hole bottom limit.

method.name: SetOrigin
method.abstract: Sets hole origin point.

method.name: SetThreadDepth
method.abstract: Sets hole thread depth.

method.name: SetThreadDiameter
method.abstract: Sets hole thread diameter.

method.name: SetThreadPitch
method.abstract: Sets hole thread pitch.

method.name: SetThreadSide
method.abstract: Sets the value of the direction of the Thread Side.

method.name: SetThreaded
method.abstract: Sets hole threading mode.

method.name: SetThreadedBottomLimit
method.abstract: Sets the hole thread bottom limit.

method.name: SetThreadedBottomType
method.abstract: Sets the hole thread bottom type.

class.name: CATIOffset
class.abstract: Interface to represent the offset feature.

method.name: GetBotOffset
method.abstract: Returns the distance between the bottom skin of the offset feature and the surfacic feature.

method.name: GetIsensOffset
method.abstract: Retrieves the offset orientation value of the offset feature.

method.name: GetSurfaceOffset
method.abstract: Retrieves the surfacic feature to be offseted.

method.name: GetTangencyContinuityMode
method.abstract: Gets the Thick Surface Tangency Continuity Mode.

method.name: GetTopOffset
method.abstract: Returns the distance between the top skin of the offset feature and the surfacic feature.

method.name: ModifyBotOffset
method.abstract: Modifies the distance between the bottom skin of the offset feature and the surfacic feature.

method.name: ModifyTopOffset
method.abstract: Modifies the distance between the top skin of the offset feature and the surfacic feature.

method.name: ReverseOffdir
method.abstract: Invert the offset orientation.

method.name: SetTangencyContinuityMode
method.abstract: Sets the Thick Surface Tangency Continuity Mode.

method.name: SwapSurface
method.abstract: Sets or swaps the surfacic feature to be offseted.

class.name: CATIPad
class.abstract: Interface which characterizes the Pad feature.

class.name: CATIPocket
class.abstract: Interface which characterizes the Pocket feature.

class.name: CATIPrism
class.abstract: Interface associated to the Pad and Pocket features.

method.name: GetAxis
method.abstract: Returns the direction internal component.

method.name: GetDirection
method.abstract: Returns the extrusion direction.

method.name: GetEndInit
method.abstract: Returns the first limit limiting element.

method.name: GetEndLimit
method.abstract: Returns the internal first limit component.

method.name: GetEndOffset
method.abstract: Returns the first limit offset value.

method.name: GetEndType
method.abstract: Returns the first limit type.

method.name: GetInnerSide
method.abstract: Returns the closing side of the open profile.

method.name: GetMergeThin
method.abstract: Returns the lateral relimitation status for a thin prism.

method.name: GetNeutralFiber
method.abstract: Returns the neutral fiber status for a thin prism.

method.name: GetProfile
method.abstract: Returns the profile internal component.

method.name: GetReferenceDir
method.abstract: Returns the reference element which specifies the direction.

method.name: GetStartInit
method.abstract: Returns the second limit limiting element.

method.name: GetStartLimit
method.abstract: Returns the second limit internal component.

method.name: GetStartOffset
method.abstract: Returns the second limit offset value.

method.name: GetStartType
method.abstract: Returns the second limit type.

method.name: GetSym
method.abstract: Tests whether the symmetrical extension is set or not.

method.name: GetThickThin1
method.abstract: Returns the value of the first thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: GetThickThin1
method.abstract: Returns the parameter links to the first thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: GetThickThin2
method.abstract: Returns the value of the second thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: GetThickThin2
method.abstract: Returns the parameter links to the second thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: GetThinCheck
method.abstract: Returns the thin status for a prism.

method.name: IsDirectionReversed
method.abstract: Tests whether the direction is opposite to the reference or not.

method.name: ModifyDirection
method.abstract: Specifies a mathematical extrusion direction.

method.name: ModifyDirection
method.abstract: Specifies an element as reference for the direction.

method.name: ModifyEndInit
method.abstract: Sets the first limit limiting element in case the type is <tt>catUpToPlaneLimit</tt> or <tt>catUpToSurfaceLimit</tt>.

method.name: ModifyEndOffset
method.abstract: Sets the first limit offset value in case the type is <tt>catOffsetLimit</tt>.

method.name: ModifyEndType
method.abstract: Sets the first limit type.

method.name: ModifyInnerSide
method.abstract: When the profile is open, specifies which side of the profile will be used for closing.

method.name: ModifyProfile
method.abstract: Sets a new element as profile.

method.name: ModifyStartInit
method.abstract: Sets the first limit limiting element in case the type is <tt>catUpToPlaneLimit</tt> or <tt>catUpToSurfaceLimit</tt>.

method.name: ModifyStartOffset
method.abstract: Sets the second limit offset value in case the type is <tt>catOffsetLimit</tt>.

method.name: ModifyStartType
method.abstract: Sets the second limit type.

method.name: ModifySym
method.abstract: Sets the symmetrical extension property.

method.name: ReverseDirection
method.abstract: Reverses the specified direction.

method.name: SetMergeThin
method.abstract: Sets the lateral relimitation status for a thin prism.

method.name: SetNeutralFiber
method.abstract: Sets the neutral fiber status for a thin prism.

method.name: SetThickThin1
method.abstract: Sets the value of the first thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: SetThickThin2
method.abstract: Sets the value of the second thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: SetThinCheck
method.abstract: Sets the thin status for a prism.

class.name: CATIPrismLimit
class.abstract: Interface which characterizes the prism limit behavior.

class.name: CATIPrtAxis1
class.abstract: Interface which provides a direction management behaviour to an axis feature.

method.name: GetDirReference
method.abstract: Returns the reference element which specifies the direction.

method.name: GetDirection
method.abstract: Returns the mathematical direction.

method.name: IsReversed
method.abstract: Tests whether the direction is opposite to the reference one or not.

method.name: ReverseDirection
method.abstract: Reverses the specified direction.

method.name: SetDirection
method.abstract: Sets an absolute direction as specification.

method.name: SetDirection
method.abstract: Sets a reference element as direction specification.

class.name: CATIPrtBooleanFactory
class.abstract: Class to define common boolean operations.

method.name: CreateAdd
method.abstract: Adds iSecond body to iFirst body.

method.name: CreateAssemble
method.abstract: Assembles iSecond body to iFirst body.

method.name: CreateIntersect
method.abstract: Intersects iSecond body to iFirst body.

method.name: CreateRemove
method.abstract: Removes iSecond body to iFirst body.

method.name: CreateVolumicAdd
method.abstract: Adds iSecond volume or body to iFirst volume.

method.name: CreateVolumicIntersect
method.abstract: Intersects iSecond volume or body to iFirst volume.

method.name: CreateVolumicRemove
method.abstract: Removes iSecond volume or body to iFirst volume.

class.name: CATIPrtBooleanOperation
class.abstract: Class to define methods relative to boolean operations.

method.name: GetFirstOperand
method.abstract: Returns the first operated body.

method.name: GetSecondOperand
method.abstract: Returns the second operated body.

method.name: GetTool
method.abstract: Returns the tool of a boolean operation.

method.name: ModifyFirstOperatedVolume
method.abstract: Modifies the First Operand.

method.name: ModifyOperatedObject
method.abstract: Modifies the Second Operand.

method.name: SwapOperatedVolume
method.abstract: Swaps the operands.

class.name: CATIPrtCenterCurve
class.abstract: Interface which provides a center curve management behavior to a feature center curve.

method.name: GetBody
method.abstract: Gets the topological body corresponding to the center curve.

method.name: GetElement
method.abstract: Gets the specificaton element of the center curve.

method.name: GetGeomSupport
method.abstract: Gets the geometrical support of the center curve.

method.name: SetElement
method.abstract: Set a new element to the specifications of the center curve.

class.name: CATIPrtCfgAddin
class.abstract: Interface to implement to add new functionalities.

class.name: CATIPrtExplodeServices
class.abstract:
Services to access to standard tables of thread/tap
Role: It enables to instantiate a standard table in a given part and then to access to all the values in it, in order to valuate the specifications of a Thread/Tap feature.

class.name: CATIPrtFactory
class.abstract: Interface to create all types of Mechanical Design feature.

method.name: CreateAffinity
method.abstract: Creates and returns an Affinity feature.

method.name: CreateAlign
method.abstract: Creates and returns a replace face feature.

method.name: CreateAxisToAxis
method.abstract: Creates and returns an AxisToAxis transformation feature.

method.name: CreateChamfer
method.abstract: Creates and returns a chamfer feature.

method.name: CreateCircPatt
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new solid circular pattern.

method.name: CreateCloseSurface
method.abstract: Creates and returns a close feature.

method.name: CreateDraft
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new draft.

method.name: CreateGroove
method.abstract: Creates a new groove.

method.name: CreateHole
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new hole feature.

method.name: CreateHole
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new hole feature.

method.name: CreateHole
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new hole feature.

method.name: CreateHole
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new hole feature.

method.name: CreateLimitedFace
method.abstract: Creates and returns a LimitedFace feature(Internal Feature).

method.name: CreateLoft
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new loft feature.

method.name: CreateMirror
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new mirror.

method.name: CreatePad
method.abstract: Creates a new pad.

method.name: CreatePocket
method.abstract: Creates a new pocket.

method.name: CreateRectPatt
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new solid rectangular pattern.

method.name: CreateRemoveFace
method.abstract: Creates and returns a RemoveFace feature as per the given context.

method.name: CreateRemovedLoft
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new removed loft feature.

method.name: CreateRib
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new rib feature.

method.name: CreateRib
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new rib feature.

method.name: CreateRotate
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Rotate feature.

method.name: CreateScaling
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Scaling feature.

method.name: CreateSewing
method.abstract: Creates and returns a sewing feature.

method.name: CreateShaft
method.abstract: Creates a new shaft.

method.name: CreateShell
method.abstract: Creates and returns a shell feature.

method.name: CreateSlot
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new slot feature.

method.name: CreateSlot
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new slot feature.

method.name: CreateSolidFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a solid face fillet feature.

method.name: CreateSolidFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a tritangent fillet feature.

method.name: CreateSolidFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a solid constant edge fillet feature.

method.name: CreateSolidFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a solid variable edge fillet feature.

method.name: CreateSolidFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a solid constant edge fillet feature with Keep Edge.

method.name: CreateSolidFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a variable solid edge fillet feature with Keep Edge.

method.name: CreateSolidOffset
method.abstract: Creates and returns an offset feature.

method.name: CreateSolidSplit
method.abstract: Creates and returns a split feature.

method.name: CreateStiffener
method.abstract: Creates a new stiffener.

method.name: CreateSurfaceFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a surface face fillet feature.

method.name: CreateSurfaceFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a tritangent fillet feature.

method.name: CreateSurfaceFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a surface constant edge fillet feature.

method.name: CreateSurfaceFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a surface variable edge fillet feature.

method.name: CreateSurfaceFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a surface constant edge fillet feature with Keep Edge.

method.name: CreateSurfaceFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a variable surfacic edge fillet feature with Keep Edge.

method.name: CreateSurfacicCircPatt
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new surfacic or volumic circular pattern.

method.name: CreateSurfacicRectPatt
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new surfacic or volumic rectangular pattern.

method.name: CreateSurfacicSewing
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Surfacic sewing feature.

method.name: CreateSurfacicUserPatt
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new surfacic or volumic user pattern.

method.name: CreateSymmetry
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Symmetry feature.

method.name: CreateThickness
method.abstract: Creates and returns a thickness feature.

method.name: CreateThread
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new thread feature.

method.name: CreateThread
method.abstract: Creates and returns a thread feature.

method.name: CreateTranslate
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Translate feature.

method.name: CreateUserPatt
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new solid user pattern.

method.name: CreateVolumicCloseSurface
method.abstract: Creates and returns a volumic close feature.

method.name: CreateVolumicDraft
method.abstract: Creates and returns a volumic draft feature.

method.name: CreateVolumicDraftAngle
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Draft feature in volumic context.

method.name: CreateVolumicOffset
method.abstract: Creates and returns a volumic offset feature.

method.name: CreateVolumicSewing
method.abstract: Creates and returns a volumic sewing feature.

method.name: CreateVolumicShell
method.abstract: Creates and returns a volumic shell feature.

method.name: CreateVolumicThickness
method.abstract: Creates and returns a thickness feature.

class.name: CATIPrtLimit
class.abstract: Interface which provides an extended limit behaviour to a limit feature.

method.name: GetOffset
method.abstract: Gets the offset specification.

method.name: GetOffsetParm
method.abstract: Gets the offset parameter.

method.name: SetOffset
method.abstract: Sets the offset specification in case the limit type is <tt>catOffsetLimit</tt>.

class.name: CATIPrtManageFeatBuild
class.abstract: Interface to store the build informations.

method.name: BuildNecessity
method.abstract: Returns the boolean flag indicating if the build is necessary.

method.name: GetBody
method.abstract: Returns the stored body.

method.name: GetCurrentJournal
method.abstract: Returns the stored topological journal.

method.name: GetLocalSketchTransfo
method.abstract: Returns the stored local transformation.

method.name: GetOperand
method.abstract: Returns the list of stored operands.

method.name: ReportIsNecessary
method.abstract: Specifies that it is necessary to store the report journal.

method.name: ReportIsNotNecessary
method.abstract: Specifies that it is not necessary to store the report journal.

method.name: ReportNecessity
method.abstract: Returns the boolean flag indicating if the report storage is necessary.

method.name: SetBody
method.abstract: Sets the computed body.

method.name: SetCurrentJournal
method.abstract: Sets the topological journal.

method.name: SetLocalSketchTransfo
method.abstract: Sets the local transformation of the sketch.

method.name: SetOperand
method.abstract: Sets the list of operands used by the patterned feature to create the report.

class.name: CATIPrtPattern
class.abstract: Interface to read or modify the specifications of the pattern.

method.name: GetAnchorPoint
method.abstract: Returns the anchor point of the original feature.

method.name: GetIfDesignIntent
method.abstract: Returns if users want to keep the specifications of the original feature such as "Up to".

method.name: GetItem
method.abstract: Returns the original feature.

method.name: GetItemList
method.abstract: Returns the list of feature used for the creation of the pattern of list.

method.name: GetNumberOfInstances
method.abstract: Returns Number of Instances in First and Second Direction.

method.name: GetTransfo
method.abstract: Return a CATMathGridOfvectors.

method.name: ModifyItem
method.abstract: Sets the original feature.

method.name: SetDesignIntent
method.abstract: Sets if users want to keep the specifications of the original feature such as "Up to".

class.name: CATIPrtProfile
class.abstract: Interface which provides a profile management behavior to a feature profile.

method.name: AddElement
method.abstract: Adds a new element to the specifications list.

method.name: GetBody
method.abstract: Gets the topological body corresponding to the profile.

method.name: GetBoundingBox
method.abstract: Gets the bounding box of the whole profile.

method.name: GetCenter
method.abstract: Gets the mathematical center of the profile bounding box.

method.name: GetContourCount
method.abstract: Gets the number of contour defined by the specification list.

method.name: GetElement
method.abstract: Gets an element of the specification list.

method.name: GetElementCount
method.abstract: Gets the number of specification elements used to define the profile.

method.name: GetGeomPlane
method.abstract: Gets the geometrical plane associated to the profile support.

method.name: GetPlane
method.abstract: Gets the mathematical plane corresponding to the support of the profile geometry.

method.name: GetSpecPlane
method.abstract: Gets the specification plane which defines the profile support.

method.name: RemoveAllElements
method.abstract: Empties the specification list.

method.name: RemoveElement
method.abstract: Removes an element from the specification list.

method.name: RemoveElement
method.abstract: Removes an element from the specification list.

class.name: CATIPrtSimpleLimit
class.abstract: Interface which provides a basic limit behaviour to a limit feature.

method.name: ClearData
method.abstract: Releases the data associated to the specifications.

method.name: ExtractData
method.abstract: Computes the data associated to the specifications.

method.name: GetExtentType
method.abstract: Returns the limit type specification.

method.name: GetInit
method.abstract: Returns the limiting element specification.

method.name: GetInitGeom
method.abstract: Gets the geometrical limiting element associated to the specifications.

method.name: GetInitGeomList
method.abstract: Gets the geometrical limiting elements associated to the specifications.

method.name: GetLimitType
method.abstract: Gets the topological limit type associated to the specifications.

method.name: GetNamingSpec
method.abstract: Gets the specification used to create the scope associated to the feature.

method.name: GetPropagGeom
method.abstract: Gets the geometrical element used for propagation associated to the specifications.

method.name: GetPropagType
method.abstract: Gets the topological propagation type associated to the specifications.

method.name: SetExtentType
method.abstract: Sets the limit type specification.

method.name: SetInit
method.abstract: Sets the limiting element for the <tt>catUpToPlaneLimit</tt> and <tt>catUpToSurfaceLimit</tt> types.

class.name: CATIPrtThreadStandardServices
class.abstract:
Services to access to standard tables of thread/tap
Role: It enables to instantiate a standard table in a given part and then to access to all the values in it, in order to valuate the specifications of a Thread/Tap feature.

method.name: CreateStandardTable
method.abstract: Create a table of thread standard from a file in a Part.

method.name: RemoveStandardTable
method.abstract: Remove a table of thread standard from a Part.

method.name: RetrieveDescriptionsFromStandardTable
method.abstract:
Retrieve the list of descriptions in a given table of thread standard
Role: This method reads inside a table in a Part to find the descriptions values of a standard.

method.name: RetrieveValuesFromStandardTable
method.abstract:
Retrieve the values in a given table of thread standard
Role: This method reads inside a table in a Part to find the values corresponding to a given description or Thread diameter in the table.

class.name: CATIPrtToPattern
class.abstract: Interface to specify pattern behaviors.

method.name: SpecificPatternNecessity
method.abstract: Returns the boolean flag indicating the algorithm used to compute the pattern.

method.name: ValidForUserPattern
method.abstract: Returns the boolean flag indicating if the feature can be used to generate a user pattern feature.

class.name: CATIPrtTrimFactory
class.abstract: Class to define advanced boolean operations called trim operations.

method.name: CreateTrim
method.abstract: Trim iSecond body to iFirst body.

class.name: CATIRectPatt
class.abstract: Interface to read or modify the specifications of the rectangular pattern.

method.name: GetAngleXY
method.abstract: Returns the angle between the real pattern directions and the two defined directions, in case of two defined directions only.

method.name: GetDir1
method.abstract: Returns the direction as a line or linear edge that specifies the pattern first distribution.

method.name: GetDir2
method.abstract: Returns the direction as a line or linear edge that specifies the pattern second distribution.

method.name: GetNb1
method.abstract: Returns the number of times that the original feature will be duplicated along pattern first direction.

method.name: GetNb2
method.abstract: Returns the number of times that the original feature will be duplicated along pattern second direction.

method.name: GetNu
method.abstract: Returns the position of the original feature among its duplications along the first direction.

method.name: GetNv
method.abstract: Returns the position of the original feature among its duplications along the second direction.

method.name: GetSens1
method.abstract: Returns the boolean flag indicating the selected first direction.

method.name: GetSens2
method.abstract: Returns the boolean flag indicating the selected second direction.

method.name: GetStep1
method.abstract: Returns the distance that separate two consecutive duplications in the pattern along its first direction.

method.name: GetStep2
method.abstract: Returns the distance that separate two consecutive duplications in the pattern along its second direction.

method.name: ModifyDirection1
method.abstract: Sets the pattern first direction.

method.name: ModifyDirection2
method.abstract: Sets the pattern second direction.

method.name: ModifySens1
method.abstract: Sets the boolean flag indicating the natural orientation of the first direction should be used to orientate the pattern operation.

method.name: ModifySens2
method.abstract: Sets the boolean flag indicating the natural orientation of the second direction should be used to orientate the pattern operation.

class.name: CATIRevol
class.abstract: Interface associated to the Shaft and Groove features.

method.name: GetEndAngle
method.abstract: Returns the first angle value.

method.name: GetEndAngleParm
method.abstract: Returns the first angle parameter.

method.name: GetMergeThin
method.abstract: Returns the lateral relimitation status for a thin prism.

method.name: GetNeutralFiber
method.abstract: Returns the neutral fiber status for a thin prism.

method.name: GetProfile
method.abstract: Returns the profile internal component.

method.name: GetReferenceAxis
method.abstract: Returns the reference element which specifies the revolution axis.

method.name: GetStartAngle
method.abstract: Returns the second angle value.

method.name: GetStartAngleParm
method.abstract: Returns the second angle parameter.

method.name: GetThickThin1
method.abstract: Returns the value of the first thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: GetThickThin1
method.abstract: Returns the parameter links to the first thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: GetThickThin2
method.abstract: Returns the value of the second thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: GetThickThin2
method.abstract: Returns the parameter links to the second thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: GetThinCheck
method.abstract: Returns the thin status for a prism.

method.name: ModifyAxis
method.abstract: Sets a new element as axis.

method.name: ModifyEndAngle
method.abstract: Sets the first angle value measured in the direct way starting from the profile.

method.name: ModifyProfile
method.abstract: Sets a new element as profile.

method.name: ModifyStartAngle
method.abstract: Sets the second angle value measured in the opposite way starting from the profile.

method.name: SetMergeThin
method.abstract: Sets the lateral relimitation status for a thin prism.

method.name: SetNeutralFiber
method.abstract: Sets the neutral fiber status for a thin prism.

method.name: SetThickThin1
method.abstract: Sets the value of the first thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: SetThickThin2
method.abstract: Sets the value of the second thickness of a thin prism.

method.name: SetThinCheck
method.abstract: Sets the thin status for a prism.

class.name: CATIRib
class.abstract: Class to manage Rib feature.

class.name: CATISewing
class.abstract: Interface to represent sewing feature.

method.name: GetSupportSurface
method.abstract: Retrieves the surfacic feature upon which a surface is sewn.

method.name: ModifySupportSurface
method.abstract: Sets the surfacic feature on which a surface is to be sewn.

class.name: CATIShaft
class.abstract: Interface which characterizes the Shaft feature.

class.name: CATIShape
class.abstract: Interface which provides a basic behavior to a Mechanical Design feature.

method.name: GetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a integer type default value.

method.name: GetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a double type default value.

method.name: GetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a CATISpecObject type default value.

method.name: IsFirstInTool
method.abstract: Tests if the feature was created in first position in its mechanical body.

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Stores a default value of integer type.

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Stores a default value of double type.

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Stores a default value of CATISpecObject type.

class.name: CATIShell
class.abstract: Class to define methods relative to the shell feature.

method.name: AddFaceToRemove
method.abstract: Adds a face to shell specifications.

method.name: AddFaceWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Adds a face with different thicknesses to shell specifications.

method.name: GetExtOffset
method.abstract: Returns the value of the external offset of the shell.

method.name: GetFacesWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Returns the list of faces with different thickness.

method.name: GetIntOffset
method.abstract: Returns the value of the internal offset of the shell.

method.name: GetNbOfFacesWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Returns the number of faces with different thickness.

method.name: GetNbOfNonOffsetFaces
method.abstract: Returns the number of non offset faces.

method.name: GetNbOfShellSpec
method.abstract: Returns the number of specified faces.

method.name: GetNonOffsetFaces
method.abstract: Returns the list of non offset faces.

method.name: GetShellSpec
method.abstract: Returns the list of specified faces.

method.name: ModifyExtOffset
method.abstract: Modifies the value of the external offset of the shell.

method.name: ModifyIntOffset
method.abstract: Modifies the value of the internal offset of the shell.

method.name: RemoveFaceWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Removes a face with different thicknesses to shell specifications.

method.name: RemoveNonOffsetFace
method.abstract: Removes a non offset face to shell specifications.

method.name: WithdrawFaceToRemove
method.abstract: Removes a face to shell specifications.

class.name: CATISimpleHole
class.abstract: Class to manage simple hole feature.

class.name: CATISlot
class.abstract: Class to manage Slot feature.

class.name: CATISplit
class.abstract: Interface to represent split feature.

class.name: CATIStiffener
class.abstract: Interface associated to the Stiffener feature.

method.name: GetInnerSide
method.abstract: Returns the closing side of the open profile.

method.name: GetProfile
method.abstract: Returns the profile internal component.

method.name: GetStiffenerMode
method.abstract: Returns the mode of the stiffener.

method.name: GetSymmetry
method.abstract: Tests whether the symmetrical extension is set or not.

method.name: GetThicknessTop
method.abstract: Returns the value of the thickness of a top thin stiffener.

method.name: GetThicknessTop
method.abstract: Returns the parameter links to the thickness of a top thin stiffener.

method.name: GetThicknessValue
method.abstract: Returns the thickness value.

method.name: IsReversedThicknessDirection
method.abstract: Tests whether the thickness direction is reversed or not.

method.name: ModifyProfile
method.abstract: Sets a new element as profile.

method.name: SetInnerSide
method.abstract: Specifies which side of the open profile will be used for closing.

method.name: SetReversedThicknessDirection
method.abstract: Allows users to reverse the thickness direction.

method.name: SetStiffenerMode
method.abstract: Sets the mode of the stiffener.

method.name: SetSymmetry
method.abstract: Sets the symmetrical extension.

method.name: SetThicknessTop
method.abstract: Sets the value of the thickness of a top thin stiffener.

method.name: SetThicknessValue
method.abstract: Sets the thickness value.

class.name: CATISuSplit
class.abstract: Interface to represent sewing and split features.

method.name: GetPlane
method.abstract: Retrieves the surfacic feature to be sewn or splitted.

method.name: GetSplitType
method.abstract: Retrieves the side to be kept for the splitting or sewing operation.

method.name: ModifySplitPlane
method.abstract: Sets or swaps the surfacic feature to be sewn or splitted.

method.name: ModifySplitType
method.abstract: Sets or modifies the side to be kept for sewing or splitting operation.

class.name: CATISweep
class.abstract: Class to manage sweep object.

method.name: GetCenterCurve
method.abstract: Returns sweep centercurve.

method.name: GetMergeThin
method.abstract: Returns the lateral relimitation status for a thin sweep.

method.name: GetNeutralFiber
method.abstract: Returns the neutral fiber status for a thin sweep.

method.name: GetProfile
method.abstract: Returns sweep profile.

method.name: GetPullingDirection
method.abstract: Returns sweep pulling direction.

method.name: GetPullingDirection
method.abstract: Returns sweep pulling direction.

method.name: GetReferenceSurface
method.abstract: Returns sweep reference surface.

method.name: GetThickThin1
method.abstract: Returns the value of the first thickness of a thin sweep.

method.name: GetThickThin1
method.abstract: Returns the parameter links to the first thickness of a thin sweep.

method.name: GetThickThin2
method.abstract: Returns the value of the second thickness of a thin sweep.

method.name: GetThickThin2
method.abstract: Returns the parameter links to the second thickness of a thin sweep.

method.name: GetThinCheck
method.abstract: Returns the thin status for a sweep.

method.name: GetTwistReductionFlag
method.abstract: Returns the twist reduction status for a sweep.

method.name: GetTwistReductionOffset
method.abstract: Returns the value of the offset if twist reduction is activated.

method.name: GetTwistReductionOffset
method.abstract: Returns the parameter links to the offset if twist reduction is activated.

method.name: HasPullingDirection
method.abstract: Returns if the sweep has a pulling direction.

method.name: SetCenterCurve
method.abstract: Sets sweep centercurve.

method.name: SetMergeThin
method.abstract: Sets the lateral relimitation status for a thin sweep.

method.name: SetNeutralFiber
method.abstract: Sets the neutral fiber status for a thin sweep.

method.name: SetProfile
method.abstract: Sets sweep profile.

method.name: SetPullingDirection
method.abstract: Sets sweep pulling direction.

method.name: SetPullingDirection
method.abstract: Sets sweep pulling direction.

method.name: SetReferenceSurface
method.abstract: Sets sweep referencesurface.

method.name: SetThickThin1
method.abstract: Sets the value of the first thickness of a thin sweep.

method.name: SetThickThin2
method.abstract: Sets the value of the second thickness of a thin sweep.

method.name: SetThinCheck
method.abstract: Sets the thin status for a sweep.

method.name: SetTwistReductionFlag
method.abstract: Sets the twist reduction status for a sweep.

method.name: SetTwistReductionOffset
method.abstract: Sets the value of the offset if twist reduction is activated.

method.name: UnsetPullingDirection
method.abstract: Resets pulling direction.

class.name: CATISweepLimit
class.abstract: Class to manage sweep limit.

class.name: CATITaperedHole
class.abstract: Class to manage tapered hole feature.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Returns the value of tapered angle.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Returns parameter linked to tapered angle.

method.name: SetAngle
method.abstract: Sets angle value of tapered angle.

class.name: CATIThick
class.abstract: Class to define methods relative to the thickness feature.

method.name: AddFaceToThicken
method.abstract: Adds a face to thickness specifications.

method.name: AddFaceWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Adds a face with different thicknesses to thickness specifications.

method.name: GetFacesWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Returns the list of faces with different thickness.

method.name: GetNbOfFacesWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Get number of faces with different thickness.

method.name: GetNbOfNonOffsetFaces
method.abstract: Get number of non offset faces.

method.name: GetNbOfThickSpec
method.abstract: Get number of specified faces.

method.name: GetNonOffsetFaces
method.abstract: Returns the list of non offset faces.

method.name: GetOffset
method.abstract: Returns the value of the offset.

method.name: GetThickSpec
method.abstract: Returns the list of specified faces.

method.name: ModifyOffset
method.abstract: Modifies the value of the offset.

method.name: RemoveFaceWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Removes a face with different thicknesses to thickness specifications.

method.name: RemoveNonOffsetFace
method.abstract: Removes a non offset face to thickness specifications.

method.name: WithdrawFaceToThicken
method.abstract: Removes a face to thickness specifications.

class.name: CATIThread
class.abstract: Class to manage the thread feature.

method.name: GetBottomLimit
method.abstract: Retrieves the thread/tap bottom limit.

method.name: GetBottomType
method.abstract: Retrieves the thread/tap bottom type.

method.name: GetDepth
method.abstract: Retrieves the thread/tap depth.

method.name: GetDepth
method.abstract: Retrieves parameter linked to the thread/tap depth.

method.name: GetDiameter
method.abstract: Retrieves the thread/tap diameter.

method.name: GetDiameter
method.abstract: Retrieves parameter linked to the thread/tap diameter.

method.name: GetLimit
method.abstract: Retrieves the thread/tap limit.

method.name: GetPitch
method.abstract: Retrieves the thread/tap pitch.

method.name: GetPitch
method.abstract: Retrieves parameter linked to the thread/tap pitch.

method.name: GetPolarity
method.abstract: Retrieves the thread polarity.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Retrieves the thread/tap support.

method.name: GetThreadDirection
method.abstract: Retrieves the thread/tap direction in regards with limit face orientation.

method.name: GetThreadSide
method.abstract: Retrieves the thread/tap direction.

method.name: SetBottomLimit
method.abstract: Sets the thread/tap bottom limit.

method.name: SetBottomType
method.abstract: Sets the thread/tap bottom type.

method.name: SetDepth
method.abstract: Sets the thread/tap depth.

method.name: SetDiameter
method.abstract: Sets the thread/tap diameter.

method.name: SetLimit
method.abstract: Sets the thread/tap limit.

method.name: SetPitch
method.abstract: Sets the thread/tap pitch.

method.name: SetPolarity
method.abstract: Sets the thread polarity.

method.name: SetSupport
method.abstract: Sets the thread/tap support.

method.name: SetThreadDirection
method.abstract: Sets the thread/tap direction.

method.name: SetThreadSide
method.abstract: Sets the thread/tap direction.

class.name: CATITrim
class.abstract: Class to define methods relative to trim operations.

method.name: AddFaceToKeep
method.abstract: Adds a face to trim specifications.

method.name: AddFaceToRemove
method.abstract: Adds a face to trim specifications.

method.name: WithdrawFaceToKeep
method.abstract: Removes a face to trim specifications.

method.name: WithdrawFaceToRemove
method.abstract: Removes a face to trim specifications.

class.name: CATITritangentFillet
class.abstract: Interface to represent the tritangent fillet shape.

method.name: GetFaceToRemove
method.abstract: Returns the removed face.

method.name: GetFirstFace
method.abstract: Returns the first filleted face.

method.name: GetSecondFace
method.abstract: Returns the second filleted face.

method.name: SetFaceToRemove
method.abstract: Sets or removes the face to be removed.

method.name: SetFirstFace
method.abstract: Sets or removes the first face to be filleted.

method.name: SetSecondFace
method.abstract: Sets or removes the second face to be filleted.

class.name: CATIUserPatt
class.abstract: Interface to read or modify the specifications of the user pattern.

method.name: GetLocationElt
method.abstract: Returns the list of location elements.

method.name: GetNbCopy
method.abstract: Returns the number of times that the original feature will be duplicated.

method.name: ModifyLocationElt
method.abstract: Sets the location elements.
